lead_paragraph: Oil prices surged on Friday, as a weaker dollar encouraged buying but investors remained cautious after Russian production figures showed weak compliance with a global deal to cut output.
snippet: Oil prices surged on Friday, as a weaker dollar encouraged buying but investors remained cautious after Russian production figures showed weak compliance with a global deal to cut output....

headline.main: Oil Rebounds From Recent Weakness, Remains Range Bound
headline.print_headline: Oil Rebounds From Recent Weakness, Remains Range Bound
